item.title: The four types of traveller you’ll meet this summer
item.author: The Angry Grad,
item.description: It’s almost the end of the academic year, meaning many of you will be in that final frenzy of wrapping up your final year projects. From frantic pipetting to manic coding, it’s all very stressful – I’ve been there. But for those of you, much like myself a year ago, the end of uni …

item.title: Feminism isn’t just for girls
item.author: The Angry Grad,
item.description: While my usual pieces have a satirical take on pop culture, this week, I thought it was about time my graduate anger is channelled towards an issue that actually has some weight. From the recent uproar regarding VAT on sanitary products, to men, mental health and suicide, you must have been living …

item.title: Buy your own fucking sweets, mate
item.author: The Angry Grad,
item.description: There are many things that irritate me more than my chafing thighs, but this week’s focus, Halloween, gets more on my tits than Dr Eva Carneiro did on Jose Mourinho’s. From jack-o(ff)-lanterns, to shit-o’-treating, this hyper-popular Americanism grates on me more than a dry shave in the heat of …

item.title: Hating on Graduation is hard
item.author: The Angry Grad,
item.description: Graduation day. Supposed to be a milestone, right? One of the happiest days of your lives, some people (morons) say. Well, not if I, the Angry Grad, have anything to do with it. I was proper excited for it to be a ‘mare, and my God did the day start off that way. I got stuck in traffic, locked in …
